original_title: 仮面ライダーゴースト: 一休眼魂アイコン争奪! とんち勝負バトル!!
overview: This is the first of two special DVD episodes of Kamen Rider Ghost. The ghost hunting gang runs into trouble when they get involved in a ganma game show. It features the debut of both the Ikkyu Ghost Eyecon as well as the Pythagoras Ghost Eyecon. It take place between episode 12 and 13 of the Kamen Rider Ghost TV series.
title: Kamen Rider Ghost: Ikkyu Eyecon Contention! Quick Wit Battle!!
